author: StockTitan
title: Usio Helps Lead Texas Flood Relief Efforts | USIO Stock News
text:
Usio Helps Lead Texas Flood Relief Efforts
Usio (Nasdaq: USIO) has announced its support for flood victims in the Texas Hill Country through a donation to The Comfort Area Foundation. The company, along with its partner BoosterHub, is helping lead relief efforts for the devastating floods that have claimed 84 lives in Kerr County alone.
The initiative demonstrates Usio's commitment to supporting local communities affected by the natural disaster. The Comfort Area Foundation aims to improve the quality of life for residents in the greater Comfort, Texas area, with both Usio and BoosterHub actively participating in collecting donations for flood victims.
Usio (Nasdaq: USIO) ha annunciato il suo sostegno alle vittime delle inondazioni nella Texas Hill Country tramite una donazione alla The Comfort Area Foundation. L'azienda, insieme al suo partner BoosterHub, sta guidando gli sforzi di soccorso per le devastanti alluvioni che hanno causato la morte di 84 persone solo nella contea di Kerr.
L'iniziativa dimostra l'impegno di Usio nel supportare le comunità locali colpite dal disastro naturale. La Comfort Area Foundation si propone di migliorare la qualità della vita dei residenti nell'area di Comfort, Texas, con la partecipazione attiva di Usio e BoosterHub nella raccolta di donazioni per le vittime delle inondazioni.
Usio (Nasdaq: USIO) ha anunciado su apoyo a las víctimas de las inundaciones en Texas Hill Country mediante una donación a The Comfort Area Foundation. La empresa, junto con su socio BoosterHub, está liderando los esfuerzos de ayuda para las devastadoras inundaciones que han causado la muerte de 84 personas solo en el condado de Kerr.
La iniciativa demuestra el compromiso de Usio de apoyar a las comunidades locales afectadas por el desastre natural. The Comfort Area Foundation tiene como objetivo mejorar la calidad de vida de los residentes en la zona de Comfort, Texas, con la participación activa de Usio y BoosterHub en la recolección de donaciones para las víctimas de las inundaciones.
Usio (나스닥: USIO)는 텍사스 힐 컨트리 홍수 피해자들을 지원하기 위해 The Comfort Area Foundation에 기부했다고 발표했습니다. 회사는 파트너인 BoosterHub와 함께 케어 카운티에서만 84명의 사망자를 낸 참혹한 홍수 구호 활동을 주도하고 있습니다.
이번 이니셔티브는 자연재해로 피해를 입은 지역사회를 지원하려는 Usio의 의지를 보여줍니다. The Comfort Area Foundation은 텍사스 컴포트 지역 주민들의 삶의 질 향상을 목표로 하며, Usio와 BoosterHub는 홍수 피해자들을 위한 기부금 모금에 적극 참여하고 있습니다.
Usio (Nasdaq : USIO) a annoncé son soutien aux victimes des inondations dans la région de Texas Hill Country par un don à la The Comfort Area Foundation. L'entreprise, avec son partenaire BoosterHub, participe activement aux efforts de secours pour les inondations dévastatrices qui ont fait 84 morts rien que dans le comté de Kerr.
Cette initiative témoigne de l'engagement d'Usio à soutenir les communautés locales touchées par cette catastrophe naturelle. The Comfort Area Foundation vise à améliorer la qualité de vie des résidents de la région de Comfort, au Texas, avec la participation active d'Usio et BoosterHub dans la collecte de dons pour les victimes des inondations.
Usio (Nasdaq: USIO) hat seine Unterstützung für die Opfer der Überschwemmungen in der Texas Hill Country durch eine Spende an die The Comfort Area Foundation angekündigt. Das Unternehmen führt zusammen mit seinem Partner BoosterHub die Hilfsmaßnahmen für die verheerenden Überschwemmungen an, die allein im Kerr County 84 Menschenleben gefordert haben.
Die Initiative zeigt Usios Engagement zur Unterstützung der von der Naturkatastrophe betroffenen lokalen Gemeinschaften. Die The Comfort Area Foundation setzt sich dafür ein, die Lebensqualität der Bewohner im Großraum Comfort, Texas, zu verbessern, wobei Usio und BoosterHub aktiv an der Sammlung von Spenden für die Flutopfer teilnehmen.
- None.
- None.
Sponsors The Comfort (Texas) Area Foundation Assisting in Marshalling Resources for Flood Victims
SAN ANTONIO, Texas, July 10, 2025 (GLOBE NEWSWIRE) -- Usio, Inc. (Nasdaq: USIO), has made a donation to, and provided support for, The Comfort Area Foundation in support of the victims of the Hill Country Floods. Usio is joined in this effort by BoosterHub, with whom Usio enjoys a long and productive relationship.
"We have all been deeply shaken by the devastating flooding in the Hill Country, throughout Texas and in the Comfort, Texas area," said Louis Hoch, Chief Executive Officer at Usio. "This donation, along with the support of our partner BoosterHub, is part of our effort to help those impacted. Our hearts and prayers go out to the many families and friends that have lost loved ones and otherwise had their lives turned upside down by this terrible tragedy. Our efforts are just a small reflection of our commitment to supporting the communities in which we live, work and play."
The devastating floods in the Texas Hill Country resulted in the many deaths with 84 of those reported in Kerr County, officials have said.
Usio, along with its partner, BoosterHub, are both helping lead the effort of The Comfort Area Foundation to collect donations to support victims in the greater Comfort, Texas area. The organization’s goal is to help improve the quality of life for all people residing in the area.
About Usio, Inc.
Usio, Inc. (Nasdaq: USIO), a leading, cloud-based, integrated FinTech electronic payment solutions provider, offers a wide range of payment solutions to merchants, billers, banks, service bureaus, integrated software vendors and card issuers. The Company operates credit, debit/prepaid, and ACH payment processing platforms to deliver convenient, world-class payment solutions and services to clients through its unique payment facilitation platform as a service. The Company, through its Usio Output Solutions division offers services relating to electronic bill presentment, document composition, document decomposition and printing and mailing services. The strength of the Company lies in its ability to provide tailored solutions for card issuance, payment acceptance, and bill payments as well as its unique technology in the card issuing sector. Usio is headquartered in San Antonio, Texas, and has offices in Austin, Texas. Websites: www.usio.com, www.payfacinabox.com, www.akimbocard.com and www.usiooutput.com. Find us on Facebook® and Twitter.
